languages.text: "Воистину. Лорд-инквизитор объявил военное положение в Просторе, и я немедля поддержала его. Ставкой штаба был избран Футфол, должность Наместника на время войны упразднена... а может, и не только на время войны. Вся власть передана коменданту — мне. Пока Лорд-инквизитор занят стратегическим планированием, я оберегаю его безопасность и навожу порядок на станции".

"Indeed I am. When the Lord Inquisitor enacted martial law in the Expanse, I offered him my support at once. Footfall was chosen as the Lord Inquisitor's headquarters, and the position of Footfall's Liege was temporarily abolished for the duration of this war... or perhaps longer than that. All authority was transferred to the station's warden — to me. While the Lord Inquisitor is preoccupied with matters of strategic planning, I am tasked with overseeing security and order."
languages.original_text: "Воистину. Лорд-инквизитор объявил военное положение в Просторе, и я немедля поддержала его. Ставкой штаба был избран Футфол, должность Наместника на время войны упразднена... а может, и не только на время войны. Вся власть передана коменданту — мне. Пока Лорд-инквизитор занят стратегическим планированием, я оберегаю его безопасность и навожу порядок на станции".

languages.text: “没错。当大审判官在科罗努斯扩区颁布戒严令时，我立刻向他提供了支持。落脚港成为了大审判官的指挥总部，落脚港暂时不再会有总督的职位，直到这场战争结束……或许这种状况会持续更久。目前，落脚港的所有权力都移交给了这座星站的守护者，也就是我。在大审判官忙于规划战略期间，我的任务就是保障这里的安全与秩序。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed I am. When the Lord Inquisitor enacted martial law in the Expanse, I offered him my support at once. Footfall was chosen as the Lord Inquisitor's headquarters, and the position of Footfall's Liege was temporarily abolished for the duration of this war... or perhaps longer than that. All authority was transferred to the station's warden — to me. While the Lord Inquisitor is preoccupied with matters of strategic planning, I am tasked with overseeing security and order."

traits.locale_text: “没错。当审判长在科罗努斯扩区颁布戒严令时，我立刻向他提供了支持。落脚港成为了审判长的指挥总部，在这场战争结束之前，落脚港暂时不再会有总督的职位……或许这种状况会持续更久。落脚港的所有权力都移交给了这座星站的守护者，也就是我。在审判长忙于规划战略期间，我的任务就是保障这里的安全与秩序。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「その通りだ。ロード・インクィジターがエクスパンスで戒厳令発動した時、私は力を貸すそうかと提案した。フットフォールはロード・インクィジターの本部として選ばれ、戦争が続く限り、フットフォールの領主の役職が一時的に廃止された…もしくは、もっと長い間排除が続くかもしれない。すべての権限は同局の所長に移譲された。つまり、私に。ロード・インクィジターが戦略に忙しくしている間は、私が安全と治安を守る」
languages.original_text: "Indeed I am. When the Lord Inquisitor enacted martial law in the Expanse, I offered him my support at once. Footfall was chosen as the Lord Inquisitor's headquarters, and the position of Footfall's Liege was temporarily abolished for the duration of this war... or perhaps longer than that. All authority was transferred to the station's warden — to me. While the Lord Inquisitor is preoccupied with matters of strategic planning, I am tasked with overseeing security and order."

traits.locale_text: 「その通りだ。ロード・インクィジターがエクスパンスで戒厳令発動した時、私は力を貸すそうかと提案した。フットフォールはロード・インクィジターの本部として選ばれ、戦争が続く限り、フットフォールの領主の役職が一時的に廃止された…もしくは、もっと長い間排除が続くかもしれない。すべての権限は同局の所長に移譲された。つまり、私に。ロード・インクィジターが戦略に忙しくしている間は、私が安全と治安を守る」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «En efecto. Cuando el Lord Inquisidor promulgó la ley marcial en la Extensión, le ofrecí mi apoyo de inmediato. Paso fue elegido como cuartel general del Lord Inquisidor y se abolió el cargo de señor de Paso mientras dure esta guerra... como mínimo. Toda la autoridad pasó al guardián de la estación, a mí. Mientras el Lord Inquisidor se ocupa de la planificación estratégica, yo me encargo de supervisar la seguridad y el orden».
languages.original_text: "Indeed I am. When the Lord Inquisitor enacted martial law in the Expanse, I offered him my support at once. Footfall was chosen as the Lord Inquisitor's headquarters, and the position of Footfall's Liege was temporarily abolished for the duration of this war... or perhaps longer than that. All authority was transferred to the station's warden — to me. While the Lord Inquisitor is preoccupied with matters of strategic planning, I am tasked with overseeing security and order."

traits.locale_text: «En efecto. Cuando el Lord Inquisidor promulgó la ley marcial en la Extensión, le ofrecí mi apoyo de inmediato. Paso fue elegido como cuartel general del Lord Inquisidor y se abolió el cargo de señor de Paso mientras dure esta guerra... como mínimo. Toda la autoridad pasó al guardián de la estación, a mí. Mientras el Lord Inquisidor se ocupa de la planificación estratégica, yo me encargo de la seguridad y el orden».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Oh ja. Als der Großinquisitor in der Ausdehnung das Kriegsrecht ausgerufen hat, habe ich ihm augenblicklich meine Unterstützung angeboten. Footfall wurde zum Hauptquartier des Großinquisitors auserkoren, und der Posten des Lehnsherren von Footfall wurde vorübergehend abgeschafft, während dieser Krieg tobt ... oder auch länger. Sämtliche Autorität wurde auf die Stationsaufseherin übertragen — mich. Während der Großinquisitor mit Angelegenheiten der strategischen Planung beschäftigt ist, habe ich die Aufgabe, für Sicherheit und Ordnung zu sorgen."
languages.original_text: "Indeed I am. When the Lord Inquisitor enacted martial law in the Expanse, I offered him my support at once. Footfall was chosen as the Lord Inquisitor's headquarters, and the position of Footfall's Liege was temporarily abolished for the duration of this war... or perhaps longer than that. All authority was transferred to the station's warden — to me. While the Lord Inquisitor is preoccupied with matters of strategic planning, I am tasked with overseeing security and order."

traits.locale_text: "Oh ja. Als der Großinquisitor in der Ausdehnung das Kriegsrecht ausgerufen hat, habe ich ihm augenblicklich meine Unterstützung angeboten. Footfall wurde zum Hauptquartier des Großinquisitors auserkoren, und der Posten des Lehnsherren von Footfall wurde vorübergehend abgeschafft, während dieser Kriegt tobt ... oder auch länger. Sämtliche Autorität wurde auf die Stationsaufseherin übertragen — mich. Während der Großinquisitor mit Angelegenheiten der strategischen Planung beschäftigt ist, habe ich die Aufgabe, für Sicherheit und Ordnung zu sorgen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « En effet. Quand le seigneur inquisiteur a décrété la loi martiale dans les Étendues, je lui ai immédiatement proposé mon soutien. Il a ensuite choisi Castel comme quartier général et le poste de suzerain a été révoqué jusqu'à la fin de cette guerre... voire plus longtemps si nécessaire. Toute autorité m'a été transférée en ma qualité de gardienne de la station. Pendant que le seigneur inquisiteur s'occupe de la planification stratégique, je suis chargée de l'ordre et de la sécurité. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed I am. When the Lord Inquisitor enacted martial law in the Expanse, I offered him my support at once. Footfall was chosen as the Lord Inquisitor's headquarters, and the position of Footfall's Liege was temporarily abolished for the duration of this war... or perhaps longer than that. All authority was transferred to the station's warden — to me. While the Lord Inquisitor is preoccupied with matters of strategic planning, I am tasked with overseeing security and order."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Quand le seigneur inquisiteur a décrété la loi martiale dans les Étendues, je lui ai immédiatement proposé mon soutien. Il a ensuite choisi Castel comme quartier général et le poste de suzerain a été révoqué jusqu'à la fin de cette guerre... voire plus longtemps si nécessaire. Toute autorité m'a été transférée en ma qualité de gardienne de la station. Pendant que le seigneur inquisiteur s'occupe de la planification stratégique, je suis chargée de l'ordre et de la sécurité. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Öyleyim. Lord Engizisyoncu, Enginlik'te sıkıyönetim ilan ettiğinde ona derhâl desteğimi sundum. Binliman, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun karargâhı olarak belirlendi ve Emîrlik makamı, savaş süresince geçici olarak feshedildi. Belki feshi daha da uzayabilir. Tüm yetki ise istasyonun dizdarına, yani bana devredildi. Lord Engizisyoncu, stratejik planlama meseleleriyle meşgulken ben de güvenlik ve düzeni sağlamakla görevlendirildim."
languages.original_text: "Indeed I am. When the Lord Inquisitor enacted martial law in the Expanse, I offered him my support at once. Footfall was chosen as the Lord Inquisitor's headquarters, and the position of Footfall's Liege was temporarily abolished for the duration of this war... or perhaps longer than that. All authority was transferred to the station's warden — to me. While the Lord Inquisitor is preoccupied with matters of strategic planning, I am tasked with overseeing security and order."

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyim, evet. Lord Engizisyoncu, Enginlik'te sıkıyönetim ilan ettiğinde, ona derhâl desteğimi sundum. Binliman, Lord Engizisyoncu'nun karargâhı olarak belirlendi ve Emîr'lik pozisyonu, bu savaş boyunca geçici olarak feshedildi. Ya da belki de daha uzun süre. Tüm yetki, istasyonun dizdarına, yani bana transfer edildi. Lord Engizisyoncu, stratejik planlama meseleleriyle meşgulken, ben de güvenlik ve düzeni sağlamakla görevlendirildim."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
